title: Caffè Latte
detail: A rich and creamy espresso with steamed milk and a light foam on top. Caffè latte is espresso with sweet steamed milk.

title: Cappuccino
detail: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a thick layer of foam.

title: Caffè Mocha
detail: Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweet whipped cream. Delicious.

title: Caramel Macchiato
detail: Espresso with vanilla syrup, milk, and caramel sauce on top. A classic choice for summer. Topped with delicious caramel drizzle.

title: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
detail: Cold brew served with a float of homemade sweet and soft vanilla cream.

title: Cold Brew
detail: Slow-brewed cold brew with a rich, naturally sweet flavor.

title: Mango Passion Frappuccino
detail: A blend of tropical mango and passionfruit, perfectly paired with hibiscus tea and ice.

title: Raspberry Currant Frappuccino
detail: Made with fresh Teavana tea, juice, and ice.

title: Coffee Frappuccino
detail: Starbucks coffee blended with nonfat milk and ice for a lighter flavor.

title: Mocha Frappuccino
detail: Mocha sauce, Frappuccino coffee, milk, and ice blend together for a mocha flavor that will keep you coming back.
